data.title: Yokai Watch
data.meta_description: Nate's watch allows him to see invisible Yo-kai.
data.text:
EPISODE 1

Episode 1

Nate discovers the world of the Yo-Kai when he frees the Yo-Kai butler Whisper from a capsule machine.

22 min Â· Jan 8, 2014 TV-Y

EPISODE 2

Episode 2

Nate tells Whisper of rumors going around about a specific Yo-Kai, which Whisper identifies as a kappa; while they try to find it, the kappa Yo-Kai, named Walkappa, tries to get their attention.

22 min Â· Jan 15, 2014 TV-Y

EPISODE 3

Episode 3

Whisper talks about the Yo-Kai Noko, and Nate sees it, but Whisper doesn't; Nate and Whisper meet the man-faced dog Yo-Kai Manjimutt, who soon gets arrested.

11 min Â· Jan 22, 2014 TV-Y

EPISODE 4

Episode 4

While Nate cleans his room, Whisper gives him the Yo-Kai Medallium to store his Yo-Kai Medals; Nate and Whisper discover a Yo-Kai, Hungramps, causing trouble at the local convenience store by making people unnaturally hungry.

11 min Â· Jan 29, 2014 TV-Y

EPISODE 5

Episode 5

Manjimutt's newest venture, a photographer, is disrupted when his client discovers he is not the one who was supposed to photograph her; Nate and Whisper discover that Eddie and Bear are under a spell.

11 min Â· Feb 5, 2014 TV-Y
